entry.title: Tuesday: Light snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness this morning then light snow beginning late this afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
